subject: PGA Championship
Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Graeme Storm, who vaulted to the front of the 89th P.G.A. Championship at Southern Hills,  has come a long way from his job at a cake factory, cleaning trays.
snippet: Graeme Storm, who vaulted to the front of the 89th P.G.A. Championship at Southern Hills,  has come a long way from his job at a cake factory, cleaning trays.
